I don't think it's on IMDB.

The films homepage - http://www.4digitalmedia.com/index.php/details/156

From IMDB News : Originally called Ferocious, Dark Nemesis is artist/director Drew Maxwell's latest independent, green screen opus. His last film, Carnivorous has its fans and its detractors, but I like that Maxwell has the ambition to get his vision up on the screen in feature form, regardless of budget and I think a lot of the images in this trailer represent some of this hard work.

Undie, if you actually prefer the directors cut ending over the original there's something seriously wrong in your brain lol.  I'd suggest you pop some more of your mental meds.  While anti depressants aren't for me, I'd suggest you to have a few downers before you go on a serious rampage.
